recipesJson.name: Propoganda Subliminal Clone v1
recipesJson.author: Murtidash
recipesJson.description:
My clone of Propaganda's Subliminal, a take on sweet and sour raspberry belts. This started out pretty complex but after trying to hit all the right notes it wound up being simpler than I would have expected. I want to continue tinkering and getting feedback but I'm happy enough with this that it's ready for public consumption.

It's ok as a S&V but really comes into its own after 2 days and it incredibly badass.

reviews.text: Great recipe - and awesome way to use up the FW Razzleberry I have that I can't seem to find any other use for.  INW Cactus really makes the Razzleberry pop and Ithe TFA Koolada helps it out quite a bit too.  Nice and simple flavouring that's by no means boring.  Best consumed fresh as the Razzleberry fades a lot faster than the Cactus, by the two week mark I found the Cactus a little over powering.

Subtle but refreshing. After 2 week steep, it is quite mellow but pleasant. May lack a strong flavour, in which case raising razzleberry to ~8% or higher may help (I find it to be a weaker flavour below 8%).
